CustomField.formula: /* Red rows from matrix */ abd_Tax_Exempt_Sales_IA_Lic_Wholesallers__c + abd_Tax_Exempt_Shipments_Out_of_State__c + abd_Tax_Exempt_Adjustments__c + abd_Gallons_Samples__c + abd_Gallons_Breakage_Destroyed__c + abd_Gallons_Spillage__c + abd_Gallons_Spoilage__c + abd_Manufacturing_Losses__c + abd_Transferred_out_in_Bond__c + abd_Gallons_used_by_Family__c + abd_Gallons_sold_at_Retail__c + abd_Wholesale_sales_Retail__c + abd_Gallons_on_hand_at_end_of_month__c
CustomField.label: Non-Taxed Gallons
